page.title: 03Buildings past and presant
page.content: There are two public_house in this area, {The Old Plough}&{The Red Lion}. They both serve traditional beers and some snacks.They are both situated in{ {South Brewham}.Most of the buildings are quite old and there are quite a lot of small farms.These are mainly cattle and sheep farms but there is also a stud farm just outside{South {Brewham}.There is a small amount of new building going on in the two Brewhams but beside that most of the buildings in the two villiages are small old counsil houses. There are two churches,one is an old {Church of England church},the other is a{Baptist church}which is relativly moden compared to the other. Also in{South Brewham}there are the remains of a weir conected to an old mill,there is also an old pub.These are both mentioned in the photographs.
